bibl.title: Early Christian Poetry. A Collection of Essays
bibl.note: Concerne plusieurs inscriptions de Léontopolis (Tell el-Yehudieh), en part. I. métriques 43; 14-16.
VAN DER HORST P.W., Jewish Metrical Epitaphs.
J. DEN BOEFT and A. HILHORST (Edd.), Early Christian Poetry. A Collection of Essays = Supplements to Vigiliae Christianae. 22 (Leiden - New York - Köln, 1993) pp. 1-13.
